title: Child of the Philippines: no time to play
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Bryan H. Easte and Don Whyte
brief_description: Highlights a day in the life of an eleven year old girl who lives in a back country village of the Philippines, and who has to work before and after an eleven hour school day. Explores the problem of children deprived of the basic right to adequate rest and relaxation.
